name: Horny Alice: Gothic Run
description:
Horny Alice: Gothic Run is a colorful runner set in a Gothic setting in which you play as the cursed prince. Your main task is to free a princess named Alice. Collect magic crystals to restore pleasant memories of the events associated with Alice.

Story:

Once in a fairy kingdom, which did not know disasters, an evil force appeared. An evil spirit from the dark kingdom has kidnapped a princess named Alice. Her husband, Roland, fell into despair and sold his soul in exchange for great power to save his wife.

Key features:

  • Kill undead.
  • Enjoy a great soundtrack.
  • Collect gold and upgrade your character.
  • Collect memory crystals to open sex scenes with Alice.
